name: ADV_EVT_GRADE_START_HX
description: The ADV_EVT_GRADE_START_HX table contains historical start date information for adverse event grades for a patient.

columns.name: ADVERSE_EVENT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the adverse event record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: HX_GRADE_START_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the grade of the adverse event at the time the adverse event was documented.
